com.herocraftonline.heroes.characters.skill

Class PassiveSkill

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.herocraftonline.heroes.command.BasicCommand
      • com.herocraftonline.heroes.characters.skill.Skill
        • com.herocraftonline.heroes.characters.skill.PassiveSkill
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SkillAlchemy, SkillBackstab, SkillEnchant, SkillFishing, SkillHerbalism, SkillMining, SkillPotion, SkillReborn, SkillShield, SkillWolf, SkillWoodcutting

    public abstract class PassiveSkill
extends Skill
    A skill that provides a passive bonus to a Hero. The skill's effects are automatically applied when a Hero of the appropriate class reaches the level specified in classes.yml. Because this skill is passive, there is no need to override the execute nor use. Messages displayed when the passive effect is applied or removed are automatically pulled from the configs. By default, the effect applied is simply the name of the skill. This can be changed by overriding apply and unapply.

    Skill Framework:
    • ActiveSkill
      • ActiveEffectSkill
      • TargettedSkill
    • PassiveSkill
    • OutsourcedSkill

      class  PassiveSkill.SkillListener
      Monitors level and class change events and tries to apply or remove the skill's effect when appropriate.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PassiveSkill

        public PassiveSkill(Heroes plugin,
            String name)
        Typical skill constructor, except that it automatically sets the usage text to Passive Skill, which should not be changed for normal use. There should be no identifiers defined as a passive skill is not meant to be executed.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the active Heroes instance

      • getDefaultConfig

        public org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection getDefaultConfig()
        Creates and returns a ConfigurationNode containing the default apply and unapply texts. When using additional configuration settings in your skills, be sure to override this method to define them with defaults.
        Overrides:
        getDefaultConfig in class Skill
        Returns:
        a default configuration

      • init

        public void init()
        Loads and stores the skill's apply and unapply texts from the configuration. By default, these texts are "%hero% gained %skill%!" and "%hero% lost %skill%!", where %hero% and %skill% are replaced with the Hero's and skill's names, respectively.
        Specified by:
        init in class Skill
